name: Black Flash Arms
description: Arms imbued with the spatial distortion of Black Flash. Grants the ability to land Black Flashes at will.
howToObtain: 10% chance when awakening in the Zone
tips: Coordinate with teammates to chain Black Flashes for multiplicative damage.

name: Burn Scars
description: Scars from a battle where you survived near-death by fire. Grants enhanced senses and survival instincts.
howToObtain: Survive Jogo's Meteor attack with < 5% HP
tips: The passive domain vision allows you to counter-domain exactly when opponents open theirs.

name: Energy Halo
description: A halo of concentrated cursed energy manifesting above the user. Signifies immense CE control.
howToObtain: Reach max Cursed Energy stat cap
tips: Great for build that rely on high CE consumption techniques.

name: Steel Arms
description: Arms hardened like steel through cursed energy reinforcement. Increases durability and weapon impact.
tips: Combos well with heavy weapons like Dragon Bone.

name: Flesh Arms
description: Mutated arms that pack a heavier punch against curses. A basic physical mutation.
howToObtain: Common drop from Cursed Spirit modification
tips: Decent starting awakening for PvE grinding.

name: Energy Horns
description: Horns formed from leaking cursed energy. Indicates an overflow of spirit energy.
